```
FAILED: IllegalArgumentException Size requested for unknown type: hivemall.tools.list.UDAFToOrderedList$UDAFToOrderedListEvaluator$AbstractQueueHandler
```

failed in Hive v2.3.0 because UDAF estimate() is lacking.

Failed also for to_ordered_map in Hive v2.3.0.

`IllegalArgumentException Size requested for unknown type: java.util.Map`

Ah... It was Hive v2.3.0 bug and not related to estimate().

https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HIVE-17406

oops... I forget that default constructor is mandatory in UDAF.

Still work in progress

```
Caused by: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: numCols SHOULD be greater than zero. numCols = rowEnd - rowStart = 0 - 0 = 0
at hivemall.math.matrix.MatrixUtils.sortIndicies(MatrixUtils.java:284)
at hivemall.math.matrix.MatrixUtils.coo2csr(MatrixUtils.java:121)
at hivemall.math.matrix.sparse.floats.DoKFloatMatrix.toRowMajorMatrix(DoKFloatMatrix.java:367)
at hivemall.math.matrix.sparse.floats.DoKFloatMatrix.toRowMajorMatrix(DoKFloatMatrix.java:41)
at hivemall.recommend.SlimUDTF.train(SlimUDTF.java:402)
at hivemall.recommend.SlimUDTF.replayTrain(SlimUDTF.java:647)
at hivemall.recommend.SlimUDTF.runIterativeTraining(SlimUDTF.java:592)
```

FFM implementation is still work in progress. 

- [ ] Need to revise `initialization scheme of V`
- [ ] Early stopping support
- [ ] Need to write documentations

@maropu could you review my PFOR implementation https://github.com/apache/incubator-hivemall/pull/121/commits/c0f465a066379a1053a654de6655da71482ee482 if possible? 
https://paperhub.s3.amazonaws.com/7558905a56f370848a04fa349dd8bb9d.pdf
Decided to avoid using DoK => CSR conversion for dataMatrix because rows are also sparse and not suited for CSR.

[![Coverage Status](https://coveralls.io/builds/13722141/badge)](https://coveralls.io/builds/13722141)

Coverage decreased (-0.01%) to 41.098% when pulling **4963c2e71279c095759ba4f545cbbb47cff667b7 on maropu:HIVEMALL-147-2** into **d4f4ab9bafec43d29a366bf955e10a62bb9e603d on apache:master**.
LGTM. Merged! Thanks.

Discussion in the user list:
https://lists.apache.org/thread.html/05c3071ad92d7a0c364d3367025c89d86c96d0971e247ee8e434f536@%3Cuser.hivemall.apache.org%3E

Enabling [instance-wise L2 normalization ](https://github.com/apache/incubator-hivemall/pull/123/files#diff-07f782d5891a557e0af0b31638b5680fR179) resulted in worse performance than `-no-norm`.

Also, training of FFM will become significantly slow when enabling instance-wise L2 normalization as training does not converge well. More investigation is required.

https://gyazo.com/4049ff3f38a3342859663b0fb0216914

Found infinite loop in findKey in a certain condition.
